survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users about their experience with our fitness app, including usability, feature satisfaction, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our fitness app?
answer_options: This is my first time using it
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users based on engagement levels. Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: How often do you use our fitness app?
answer_options: This is my first time using it

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allows identification of popular features. Use checkboxes for multi-selection.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the app's user interface? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure labels are clear.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio button with scale labels shown.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the app's user interface? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the app?
questions.client_notes: Open-text to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-ended text input with character limit.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the app?

questions.question_text: Have you achieved your fitness goals using our app?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure app effectiveness. Include a neutral option.

script.question_text: Have you achieved your fitness goals using our app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our app to others?
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS-style question. Use a single-choice format.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our app to others?

questions.question_text: Which device do you primarily use to access the app?

script.question_text: Which device do you primarily use to access the app?

questions.question_text: How important is social/community features in a fitness app to you? (1 = Not important, 5 = Extremely important)

script.question_text: How important is social/community features in a fitness app to you? (1 = Not important, 5 = Extremely important)

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended for feature requests. Optional question.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in the app?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in a premium version of the app with additional features?
answer_options: Possibly, depending on features and price
No, I prefer the free version
I already use the premium version
